title: You know really needs an update?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=GenoXx,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jnGdsUEx,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-03-24T19:01:55.158+0000)
>
> A map of Runeterra.

Hello.

I agree.

Working on it!
At least Half Life 3 will be out when we finally get the map.
Once that happens they must create a collection of it to release it in one piece.
I'm certainly looking forward to owning all 150 volumes of One Piece in a single convenient 20-foot-thick collection.

You know, not trying to be a jerk or anything, I know your not on the league team and stuff, but that's been said before. It would be nice if we could maybe get some official progress on it. That makes it yrs since it's 2018 now...

Maybe they are waiting for all regions to get updated so that they have settled idea what they want in the map.

For example, If they released it before Zaun/Piltover update, these would be two close but still horizontally different cities, and they'd need to update it again as Zaun/Piltover update put Zaun beneath Piltover.

Then there's Icathia. We don't have directly Arabic inspired area and Icathia is starting to have culture of its own by Malza having stereotyped arabic clothes, Jax being moved to Icathia and also having arabic-looking clothes, Icathia getting even more into the lore. It has potantial of being specific region of its own. This would change how it will appear on the map - independent region, runeterran place distorted by void; or will it be just some place in Shurima? Icathia would need to be updated before that.

Then there's Bundle City. It needs update to fully settle down whether it can be pinned to location and is just covered in mystic woods or whether it's in some different dimension or what. Yet again, this update would affect the map.

Etc.
